meta_description:
The Art and Culture Center/Hollywood cultivates creativity and the support of the arts in our community through education, innovation, and collaboration.
​
Core Values
‣ Creativity
‣ Education
‣ Innovation
‣ Collaboration
hours_text:
#### ​

# Hours and Admission

Hours and Admission

##### Office Hours

Tuesday – Friday, 9 AM – 5 PM

##### ​

##### Gallery Hours

Tuesday - By Appointment / Tours

Wednesday – 11 AM - 6 PM

Thursday - 11 AM - 8 PM

Friday - 11 AM - 6 PM  
Saturday – Sunday, 12 – 4 PM

The Center Galleries are closed on Mondays and Tuesdays, but open for private groups on Tuesdays.

​​

##### Admission

FREE

  * Members of the Hollywood Art and Culture Center

  * Children ages 12 and under (not including group tours)

  * All guests for Free Arts Day on the 3rd Sunday of the month

  * Active US military personnel and their immediate families  
(with valid military ID)

  * Teachers (with valid school ID)

  * NARM members (with valid Membership Card) 

  * Museums for All with valid Snap EBT card plus valid photo ID (admission for cardholder and up to 3 additional guests)

$10 \- General Admission

$5 \- Seniors ages 65 +, Students (with valid school ID), 

Youth ages 13-17

Hollywood Art and Culture Center is located in the historic Kagey Home built in 1924 and is a beautiful example of Mediterranean Revival architecture. 

[Learn more about the historic](https://www.artandculturecenter.org/about-the-center)  
[Kagey Home](https://www.artandculturecenter.org/about-the-center)

[](https://www.artscalendar.com)

Directions

##### Directions

Hollywood Art and Culture Center  
1650 Harrison St.  
Hollywood, FL 33020

​

The Center is located one block south of Hollywood Boulevard at the co...

collections_text:
## [Visit the Center](https://www.artandculturecenter.org/visit)

###### Galleries are closed for   
installation until 1/31/26  
Office Hours:  
Tuesday - Friday  
9 AM \- 5 PM  
Gallery Hours:  
Tuesday - By Appointment  
Wednesday 11 AM - 6 PM  
Thursday 11 AM - 8 PM  
Friday 11 AM - 6 PM  
Saturday - Sunday  
12 pm - 4 pm

###### Admission:  
Adults $10  
Members FREE  
Students/Seniors w/ID $5  
Children 12 & Under FREE  
Teachers/Military w/ ID FREE

### [Become a Member!](https://www.artandculturecenter.org/become-a-member)

##### [Become a member at the  
FRIEND-LEVEL and ABOVE and receive free membership to the North American Reciprocal Museums (NARM) program. NARM gives you Free admission to over 1,300 cultural institutions throughout North America!](https://www.artandculturecenter.org/new-center-memberships/friend)

[DONATE NOW!](https://artandculturecenter.app.neoncrm.com/forms/donations)

# UPCOMING EVENTS

[](https://thinkingcaptheatre.org/shows/cymbeline-by-william-shakespeare/)

CYMBELINE  

Final Show Dates: December 13 and 14   
  
Reviews are in, Cymbeline is a triumph. Dubbed Shakespeare’s “kitchen sink” play for its mashup of comedy, tragedy, history, and romance, don't miss this sweeping tale of love, betrayal, forgiveness, and the resilience of the human spirit.   

[TICKETS ](https://thinkingcaptheatre.org/shows/cymbeline-by-william-shakespeare/)
